lead_paragraph: Colombian club Atletico Nacional on Tuesday publicly asked the South American football federation CONMEBOL to award the Sudamericana Cup to Brazilian rival Chapecoense after most of the team's players were killed in an air crash.

headline.print_headline: Colombian Club Calls for Brazilian Rival to Be Awarded Sudamericana Cup
headline.main: Colombian Club Calls for Brazilian Rival to Be Awarded Sudamericana Cup

snippet: Colombian club Atletico Nacional on Tuesday publicly asked the South American football federation CONMEBOL to award the Sudamericana Cup to Brazilian rival Chapecoense after most of the team's players were killed in an air crash....
